review: Really, really awesome game. It is actually just one massive huge level with no loading-zones at all. Massive legendary fun driving around this place, it's like a not-♥♥♥♥ version of GTA (and seeing how everyone loved GTA... imagine how cool this game is!).

There is more life and colour in one minute of Mirror's Edge than there is in an entire slog through Call of Face Killer 12, or the lastest Angry-Man With Gun 15. If you do not play this game, you are denying yourself one of gaming's true treasures, and you can't come to my birthday party.
This game is pretty sweeeet, and turtling is less of an insta-fail now :-)
